root.name: Pac-Man & Galaga Dimensions
root.description: New gamesPac-Man TiltPac-Man Tilt.This is a 2D Platformer starring Pac-Man. Players control Pac-Man using the analog pad and control the stage using the 3DS gyroscope.Galaga 3D ImpactThis variation of Galaga is a rail shooter that requires the player to aim and shoot at enemies using the 3DS gyroscope.Extra GamesPac-Man Galaga Dimensions will come with 4 additional games:Pac-Man: Championship EditionPac-Man (Arcade)Galaga LegionsGalaga (Arcade)
